skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: unknown

security_audit.summary: This is an official skill from the Anthropic repository. Minimal review indicates no security risks. Safe to publish as provided.

content.value_statement: You need a frontend interface that does not look generic or templated. This skill produces production-grade UI code with a clear, bold visual direction.
actual_capabilities: Generates production-grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript interfaces
Selects a bold aesthetic direction and applies it consistently
Provides typography, color, and layout guidance for distinctive UI
Adds animation and motion guidance for impactful interactions
Advises on backgrounds, textures, and visual detail treatments
limitations: Does not run or render code to verify visual results
Does not include asset files such as images or fonts by default
Does not guarantee accessibility compliance without user requirements
Does not integrate with a specific design system unless provided

use_cases.title: Launch a bold landing page
use_cases.description: Create a distinctive landing page that stands out from standard templates.

use_cases.title: Style a new dashboard
use_cases.description: Design a unique dashboard layout with strong typography and motion.

use_cases.title: Prototype a UI concept
use_cases.description: Generate a polished UI mockup with a clear visual theme.

prompt_templates.title: Build a simple landing
prompt_templates.scenario: Basic marketing site for a new product
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a single page landing site for a task manager. Use a bold, minimal aesthetic, custom typography pairing, and subtle page load animation.

prompt_templates.title: Create a dashboard UI
prompt_templates.scenario: Analytics dashboard for a SaaS app
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a responsive analytics dashboard layout with strong visual hierarchy, asymmetry, and a distinctive color palette. Provide HTML and CSS.

prompt_templates.title: Design a hero section
prompt_templates.scenario: Hero for a mobile app website
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a hero section for a fitness app. Include a dramatic background treatment, unique typography, and a call to action button style.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced themed app UI
prompt_templates.scenario: Full page UI with motion and texture
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a full page web UI for a retro-futuristic music platform. Use custom fonts, gradient mesh background, and staggered reveal animations.

output_examples.input: Design a bold landing page for a finance app with a refined aesthetic.
output: Clear aesthetic direction: refined, editorial, high contrast
Typography pairing with a distinctive display font and clean body font
High impact hero layout with asymmetric grid
CSS variables for palette and spacing consistency

best_practices: State the purpose, audience, and constraints upfront
Ask for framework and accessibility requirements
Request a specific aesthetic direction if you have one
anti_patterns: Asking for generic or template-like UI
Requesting multiple unrelated themes in one design

faq.question: Is this compatible with React or Vue?
faq.answer: Yes. It can generate HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and guidance for React or Vue when specified.

faq.question: Are there output size limits?
faq.answer: Yes. Very large multi page apps may need to be split into smaller requests.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my design system?
faq.answer: Yes. Provide your tokens, components, and rules so the output aligns.

faq.question: Does it store or share my data?
faq.answer: No. The skill uses your prompt to generate output and does not store data.

faq.question: What if the design looks off when built?
faq.answer: Share screenshots or constraints, then request adjustments for layout, typography, or spacing.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic UI generators?
faq.answer: It focuses on bold, distinctive aesthetics and avoids common template patterns.
